A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: With any Star Wars adventure there should be a sense of wonder and adventure. While I liked most of the Force Awakens\, The Last Jedi was not fun to watch. I grew tired of the one liner jokes and unrealistic battles scenes when compared to the previous movies. The plot was boring and had plus holes everywhere. I can forgive unrealistic elements when a movie engages me. I was lost as soon as I heard “hold please”
